title: Dogs with the most Instagram followers worldwide 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of followers in millions for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Number of followers in millions 6.6 is found at Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and the minimum is found at Manny @manny the frenchie where Month is 1.0.
The highest Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom has 5.6 more Number of followers in millions than the lowest Month Manny @manny the frenchie.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of followers in millions for 10 number of Months.
Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom has the highest Number of followers in millions and Manny @manny the frenchie has the lowest Number of followers in millions.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of followers in millions for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Number of followers in millions 6.6 is found at Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and the minimum is found at Manny @manny the frenchie where Month is 1.0.
The highest Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom has 5.6 more Number of followers in millions than the lowest Month Manny @manny the frenchie.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of followers in millions in each Month on the y axis.
Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom has the highest Number of followers in millions and Manny @manny the frenchie has the lowest Number of followers in millions.
Month Doug the Pug @itsdougthepug has the second highest value for Number of followers in millions.
The difference of Number of followers in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 5.6.

Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom is higher than any other Months with value 6.6, followed by Doug the Pug @itsdougthepug, and Maruto @Marutaro. Down to Month Manny @manny the frenchie with the lowest value 1.0.
Overall Number of followers in millions has declined over the Months.
Similar Number of followers in millions is found in Month Manny @manny the frenchie, and Loki and Bear @Lokistagram.
The highest value 6.6 at Jiff Pom @Jiffpom is almost 2.95 times larger than the average value 2.24.
The Number of followers in millions is 22.4 if we add up values of all Months.
